greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A triangle of coefficients of A053122 type binomials {x,y},{y,z} and {z,x}, made using A_n Cartan type matrix characteristic polynomials: an(x,n) = CharacteristicPolynomial(M(A_n,n)); f(x,y,n) = Sum[Coefficients(an[x,n)*x^i*y^(n-i),{i,0,n}]; p(x,y,z,n) = f(x,y,n) + f(y,z,n) + f(z,x,n).
mathematica: M[d_] := Table[T[n, m, d], {n, 1, d}, {m, 1, d}]; an[x_, n_] := If[n == 0, 1, CharacteristicPolynomial[M[n], x]]
f[x_, y_, n_] := Sum[CoefficientList[an[x, n], x][[i + 1]]*x^i*y^(n - i), {i, 0, Length[CoefficientList[an[x, n], x]] - 1}];
Table[ExpandAll[f[x, y, n] + f[y, z, n] + f[x, z, n]], {n, 0, 10}];
a = Table[CoefficientList[ExpandAll[f[x, y, n] + f[y, z, n] + f[x, z, n]] /. y -> 1 /. z -> 1, x], {n, 0, 10}]; Flatten[a]
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Jun 11 2008
